description.paragraph1: Discover the Ultimate Car Rental Experience with Abag Rent – Reliable, Affordable, and Convenient
description.paragraph2: At Abag Rent, we’re dedicated to delivering a car rental service that’s tailored to your lifestyle. Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, our goal is to provide a stress-free and reliable solution that gets you on the road with ease. We pride ourselves on offering a wide range of vehicles, transparent pricing, and customer service that goes the extra mile. With locations that make pick-up and drop-off a breeze, renting a car has never been more convenient or affordable. Choose Abag Rent for a journey that’s as smooth as your ride!

content.paragraph1: Welcome to ABAG Rent. We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal data when you use our website, www.abag-rent.ch.
content.paragraph2: ABAG Rent, is the data controller responsible for your personal data.
content.paragraph3: We collect the following types of personal data: Identity Data (Name, title, date of birth, and gender), Contact Data (Address, email address, phone number), Financial Data (Payment card details or banking information for transactions), and Technical Data (IP address, browser type, time zone settings, and information about how you use our website).
content.paragraph4: We collect personal data through: direct interactions when you fill out forms or make bookings on our site, and automated technologies such as cookies that collect technical data about your browsing behavior.
content.paragraph5: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds: Consent (where you have provided your explicit consent, e.g., for marketing communications), Contractual Necessity (to perform our obligations under the rental agreement with you), Legitimate Interests (for running our business and improving services), and Legal Obligations (e.g., for tax compliance).
content.paragraph6: We use your personal data to process and manage your bookings, facilitate payments, provide customer support, send marketing communications (if opted in), and analyze site usage to improve services.
content.paragraph7: We will only share your personal data with third-party service providers (e.g., payment processors or IT service providers) who are GDPR-compliant, or to comply with legal obligations or requests by authorities. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.
content.paragraph8: Your personal data may be transferred to and processed in countries outside of the European Economic Area (EEA). We ensure such transfers are legally compliant, using Standard Contractual Clauses or Privacy Shield participation.
content.paragraph9: We will retain your personal data only as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected, including legal, accounting, or reporting requirements. For example, financial transaction data will be retained for 6 years for tax purposes.
content.paragraph10: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data: Access (request access to your personal data), Rectification (request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete data), Erasure (request deletion of your data under certain conditions), Restriction (request restricted processing in certain circumstances), Objection (object to processing based on legitimate interests), and Data Portability (request a copy of your data in a structured, machine-readable format). To exercise these rights, please contact us at info@abag-rent.ch.
content.paragraph11: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data, preventing unauthorized access, disclosure, or loss.
content.paragraph12: We use cookies to enhance your experience on our website. You can manage or disable cookies through your browser settings.
content.paragraph13: We may update this policy from time to time to comply with legal requirements or improve our practices. Please review this page regularly for updates.
content.paragraph14: If you have any questions regarding this policy or wish to exercise your rights under the GDPR, please contact us at: Email: info@abag-rent.ch

content.paragraph1: Please note the following points, which apply to all rental contracts:
content.paragraph2:
Deposit:

Customers without permanent residence in Switzerland are required to pay a deposit. The amount varies depending on the duration of the contract and the type of vehicle. You will be informed of the exact amount of the deposit at the time of booking.
content.deductible:
Deductible in the event of damage:

In the event of damage, liability insurance with a deductible of CHF 1,000 applies for both partial and fully comprehensive insurance.
content.agreement1: The vehicle must be cleaned inside and returned with a full tank of gas.
content.agreement2: All our vehicles are non-smoking vehicles.
content.agreement3: The car must be returned in the same condition as documented in the photos and videos on the day of return.
content.agreement4: Failure to comply with these conditions may result in additional costs, depending on the condition of the vehicle on return. This does not apply to slight signs of use, which are explained in more detail in the attached PDF file.
content.jurisdiction:
General contractual conditions and place of jurisdiction:

The customer declares that he has taken note of the contractual terms and conditions listed below, including the agreement on the place of jurisdiction, and recognizes them as binding.
